disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 29 May to end of Monday 30 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cooler temperatures are expected for Sunday and Monday, with the possibility of rain.  Winds should be more northerly with a relatively 'clean' air flow. <br/><br/>With adequate dispersion of local emissions, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
